product_name: NYX Professional MakeupFace Freezie Cooling Hydration Moisturizer + Primer
summary: SummaryHighlightsClean IngredientsCruelty FreeVeganGive BackPrep, cool, and hydrate all in one with Face Freezie Hydrating Moisturizer + Primer from NYX Professional Makeup, featuring 10-in-1 skin loving benefits!
details: DetailsBenefitsCooling is just the tip of the iceberg! Perfect your priming game with the coolest trend in wellness.Featuring 10-IN-1 benefits, this makeup prep care preps, evens, smooths, minimizes pores, tightens, hydrates, sculpts, softens, calms & revitalizes skin.Indulge in the icy unique frozen sorbet texture that melts on your skin, leaving behind a fresh cooling sensation!For maximum icy benefits, pair with the Face Freezie Reusable Cooling Undereye Patches.Vegan & cruelty free.Key IngredientsFormulated with Snow Mushroom for 24-hour hydration, and Niacinamide to tighten those pores!Item 2605421How To UseApply AM and PM on clean, dry skin. Wear alone for that dewy, fresh-face finish or before makeup/foundation for makeup-ready skin. Avoid eye area and direct eye contact. Get iced out with cryo inspired benefits by pairing with our Face Freezie Cooling Undereye Patches, before or after application!IngredientsAqua / Water / Eau, Glycerin, Butylene Glycol, Sodium Acrylates Crosspolymer-2, Pentylene Glycol, Xylitol, Methylpropanediol, Niacinamide, Solanum Melongena Fruit Extract / Eggplant Fruit Extract, Corallina Officinalis Extract, Coccinia Indica Fruit Extract, Curcuma Longa Root Extract, Aloe Barbadensis Flower Extract, Melia Azadirachta Flower Extract, Melia Azadirachta Leaf Extract, Tremella Fuciformis Extract / Mushroom Extract, Ocimum Sanctum Leaf Extract, Methyl Diisopropyl Propionamide, Ammonium Acryloyldimethyltaurate/Vp Copolymer, Hydroxyethyl Acrylate/Sodium Acryloyldimethyl Taurate Copolymer, T-Butyl Alcohol, Ethylhexylglycerin, Phenoxyethanol
how_to_use: Apply AM and PM on clean, dry skin. Wear alone for that dewy, fresh-face finish or before makeup/foundation for makeup-ready skin. Avoid eye area and direct eye contact. Get iced out with cryo inspired benefits by pairing with our Face Freezie Cooling Undereye Patches, before or after application!
ingredients: Solanum Melongena Fruit Extract / Eggplant Fruit Extract

reviews.headline: Must have for 40+
reviews.comments: I hardly ever use primers, i bought this because i love a cooling effect. It made SO much difference in my makeup application I couldn't believe it. I am stovking up because who knows how long itll be around. Blurred, cooled, moisturized, and gripped my makeup. Made my under eyes look more youthful. 11/10 recommend.    ps: i never leave reviews

reviews.headline: NOPE! NOPE! RUN!!!!
reviews.comments: Too thick feels like vapor rub!

reviews.headline: Doesâ€¦ nothing?
reviews.comments: The texture looked interesting in store, and since I liked other NYX primers, I thought I'd give it a go. After multiple uses, I can confidently say that this product does nothing for me (literally). My skin feels no different when I put it on, and I haven't noticed it making my makeup look better or last longer compared to not wearing a primer at all. The cooling effect makes it not for use around the eyes, but that's exactly where I need my primer to focus on my concealer. Disappointed that NYX traded their Angel Veil shelf space for this product lineâ€¦ definitely not worth the price tag!

reviews.headline: Loved it
reviews.comments: I really found this primer to be cooling soothing, and just overall a very good quality product before applying foundation. I would definitely buy it again.

reviews.headline: Like putting menthol..like that's in muscle crean on face
reviews.comments: Would not buy  this again..reminded me of that menthol bio freeze cream that's been water down about 90 percent..its aweful..it took forever to stop that feeling..and it made my eyes burn..even though I didn't put on eyes..

reviews.headline: Fun texture!
reviews.comments: I'm obsessed with this product.  The texture is like nothing I've ever felt.  It's somehow soft and fluffy/bouncy feeling but oh so cooling and hydrating on the skin.  I love it so much and use daily.  Will definitely repurchase!

reviews.headline: Great product
reviews.comments: Use daily

reviews.headline: Awesome for Florida heat
reviews.comments: Great moisturizer/primary. I just put a serum on and then use this. It goes on smooth and lasts all day with no oil even though i have combo oily skin. I definiely recommend!

reviews.headline: Awesome for acne prone skin
reviews.comments: I have had extremely dry skin since i was born & i have tried dozens of hydrating primers from drugstore to luxury & this is by far is the best one that i have used. This is the first primer that i have used that doesn't leave my face looking dry & patchy after using foundation & powder. It also is very cooling so be careful around your eyes. It's also very good for sensitive skin & hasn't caused acne tk break-out. The only reason I'm taking a star off is because I don't really see any difference with my pores. I absolutely recommend this especially if most primers cause you to break-out.

reviews.headline: Best Primer Ever!!
reviews.comments:
Primers have always cause major breakout but this NYX Primer does wonders for my face! My face loves it. I am older and have combination skin. This primer goes on nicely amd makup stays on all day! 
Love Love it!!

reviews.headline: First time using not bad
reviews.comments: I was very skeptial but intrigued. I finally got it. Oml getting it in store almost all of them had someones fingers dug in it :( but I found one that was good. Anyways my skin is combo, dry on the cheeks, oily in the tzone. There's a slight smell to it nothing overpowering. I didn't get a tingly feelings. The product is very light weight. Only needed a small dab to cover my whole face. It does fell kind of like the elf tone adjusting primer just not as greasy. My foudnation glided on real easily. I do think my skin does look good so far :) Very mich recommened for those with dry skin

reviews.headline: First time using not bad
reviews.comments: I was very skeptial but intrigued. I finally got it. Oml getting it in store almost all of them had someones fingers dug in it :( but I found one that was good. Anyways my skin is combo, dry on the cheeks, oily in the tzone. There's a slight smell to it nothing overpowering. I didn't get a tingly feelings. The product is very light weight. Only needed a small dab to cover my whole face. It does fell kind of like the elf tone adjusting primer just not as greasy. My foudnation glided on real easily. I do think my skin does look good so far :) Very mich recommened for those with dry skin

reviews.headline: Amazing and not expensive
reviews.comments: Was just in Ulta looking around and saw this new item from NYX. Decided to try it and I am so happy I did. This primer is so good and is gripping like Milk. This product is long lasting and keeps the shine away. It has a tingling sensation when applying and I Love that ! NYX is really upping their game and I believe, they are doing a great job. Thanks for a good product for less cost.

reviews.headline: breakouts
reviews.comments: this product sucks oily rat in sewer

reviews.headline: Finally!!!
reviews.comments:
Finally a primer that does not make my face breakout!!! 
Love! Love! Love!!

reviews.headline: Did like made me break out
reviews.comments: Did not like

reviews.headline: Breakout !
reviews.comments: I do not have sensitive skin but when i applied on my face it feel more like a burning sensation than a cooling effect . I really wanted to love this product but after a couple of times of using this it made me breakout bad . My skin is usually clear but it broke me out on the spots I applied. If you apply to much it can also cause flaking and ruin your makeup .

reviews.headline: COOL ðŸ˜Ž SWEET MOISTURE
reviews.comments: Sorry but 5 STARS is not enough, I am giving 5 MILLION STARS for my rating on this. WOW ,I CAN'T live without this either,  and do like they say, put it on the REFRIGERATOR  especially if you are like me with these crazy HOT FLASHES AND NIGHT SWEATS , this will save your life !!!!!

reviews.headline: Made me breakout
reviews.comments: Wanted to love this but broke me out so bad

reviews.headline: OBSESSED
reviews.comments: I love love love this for a primer! I wear a powder foundation so my base needs to be super hydrating. Ir created the smoothest cancas of foundation ive ever had!!!

media.headline: Best Primer Ever!
media.caption: Excellent means no harmful chemicals and cruelty free!!! The app is called Yuka if anyone wants to try themselves.

media.headline: Shook
media.caption: Up from nap and still looks amazing

faceoff_positive.comments: Y'all I used this this morning 730am applied my makeup. I literally just woke up 5pm from a nap where I was sweating and my makeup didn't move for nothing! Best primer I've ever ised
faceoff_positive.headline: Shook

faceoff_negative.comments: The cooling feeling was nice, it didn't keep my makeup fresh, I got oily within 30 minutes of putting my makeup on. The pore filler from NYX works magically though!
faceoff_negative.headline: Not up to the hype!

rollup.name: Face Freezie Cooling Hydration Moisturizer + Primer
